name: HiOlink
0:
”Alexa, turn on LIGHTS”
”Alexa, turn off LIGHTS”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can use HiOlink skill to control any Supported By HiOlink smart home device.
You need to login with your HiOlink Account which created in HiOlink App.
After login, You will show all your devices listed and you can control any device by saying "Alexa, turn on DEVICE", "Alexa, turn off DEVICE".
